name: Thump.in
overview:
Advertising thrives on engaging and entertaining consumers. Thump.in is a platform for consumers to register what they feel about the advertising they see, and for advertisers to begin conversations with consumers and find out if their communication works.

Thump.in proposes to keep a check on the pulse of the advertising business with forum for consumers to interact with each other, and feedback to brands. With traditional media proliferating, and new media emerging there is new learning on what works and what doesn’t in terms of media, messaging, tone & manner and brand values that is evolving. Thump.in can become the voice of this new learning.
